pullRequest.title: Add SqlBaseParser initializer hook and refreshable ATN caches
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds utility classes that enable explicit initialization and management of antlr parser and lexer ATN caches. Without them, these fields are static constants that can grow to retain multiple GB of heap space depending on input query strings.

nodes.bodyText:
Suppress the warning so the IDE won't flag it
@SuppressWarnings("ObjectEquality")

Can we use checkArgument for this? The parser depends on Guava already.
Also, we avoid using this. unless it's required
I'd just call this field initializer for conciseness.

commit.message:
Add SqlBaseParser initializer hook and refreshable ATN caches

Adds utility classes that enable explicit initialization and
management of antlr parser and lexer ATN caches. Without them,
these fields are static constants that can grow to retain multiple
GB of heap space depending on input query strings.

afterCommit.message:
Add SqlBaseParser initializer hook and refreshable ATN caches

Adds utility classes that enable explicit initialization and
management of antlr parser and lexer ATN caches. Without them,
these fields are static constants that can grow to retain multiple
GB of heap space depending on input query strings.
